Instructions for
Individuals

What you Need

In order to try our experience you will need the following things.

Google Pixel

Google Daydream

Computer or Phone

Before You Start

This may be the first time you have used virtual reality equipment. It’s easy to use but may feel foreign at first. The instructions will guide you through step-by-step.

Occasionally, virtual reality can bring on sensations of motion sickness. We’ve designed the program to reduce this effect. Tightly fastening the goggles so that the images are clear will also help. Goggles should feel comfortable and not rest on the cheekbones. You may remove the goggles at any time if you feel uncomfortable.

If you feel uncomfortable while going through the experience either because of the content or the device, feel free to stop and take the headset off.

How to Start

  • Step 1

    Download the App

    Download and install the app on a Daydream compatible phone.

    List of Daydream ready phones can be found here:
    Daydream-ready phones

    To setup the controller for left handed use, follow the instructions on the following link: Manage Daydream VR settings

  • Step 2

    Get Prepared

    Start the app and place the phone in the Daydream goggles, following the app’s onscreen instructions.

  • Step 3

    Start the Experience

    • Find a quiet, comfortable place to sit away from a desk or objects that may obstruct your movement.
    • Put on the headset and adjust it to be comfortable.
    • Put on the headphones.
    • Press a long click on the home button on the controller. This will re-center the scene.
    • Start the experience by clicking once on the main, uppermost button on the controller.
    • Note: if you are using glasses, you keep them on during the experience.

  • Step 4

    End the Experience

    When the experience is over, remove the headphones and headset and shut down the app to prevent the device from overheating.

After the Experience

We’ve created some questions to help you to process your response.
Click the link below to move onto the survey.

Take the Survey
